metadata.title: CVE-2024-50283 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix slab-use-after-free in smb3_preauth_hash_rspksmbd_user_session_put should be called under smb3_preauth_hash_rsp().It will avoid freeing session before calling smb3_preauth_hash_rsp().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
